title.newValue: Microsoft Stream: Create, view and share playlists in SharePoint

description.newValue:
This feature will allow users to organize their video and audio files into a playlist for easy organization, sharing and playback. Users can add any video and audio files to a playlist that they have edit access to. People with access to the playlist and to the files in the playlist can view the videos in order or skip back and forth between items in the playlist.
GA date: January CY2023
